verses.verse: For <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> will have mercy <WH7355> on <WH853> Jacob, <WH3290> and will yet <WH5750> choose <WH977> Israel, <WH3478> and set <WH5117> them in <WH5921> their own land: <WH127> and the strangers <WH1616> shall be joined <WH3867> with <WH5921> them, and they shall cleave <WH5596> to <WH5921> the house <WH1004> of Jacob. <WH3290>

And the people <WH5971> shall take <WH3947> them, and bring <WH935> them to <WH413> their place: <WH4725> and the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> shall possess <WH5157> them in <WH5921> the land <WH127> of the LORD <WH3068> for servants <WH5650> and handmaids: <WH8198> and they shall take <WH1961> them captives, <WH7617> whose captives <WH7617> they were; and they shall rule over <WH7287> their oppressors. <WH5065>

And it shall come to pass <WH1961> in the day <WH3117> that the LORD <WH3068> shall give thee rest <WH5117> from thy sorrow, <WH4480> <WH6090> and from thy fear, <WH4480> <WH7267> and from <WH4480> the hard <WH7186> bondage <WH5656> wherein <WH834> thou wast made to serve, <WH5647>

That thou shalt take up <WH5375> this <WH2088> proverb <WH4912> against <WH5921> the king <WH4428> of Babylon, <WH894> and say, <WH559> How <WH349> hath the oppressor <WH5065> ceased! <WH7673> the golden city <WH4062> ceased! <WH7673>
The LORD <WH3068> hath broken <WH7665> the staff <WH4294> of the wicked, <WH7563> and the scepter <WH7626> of the rulers. <WH4910>

He who smote <WH5221> the people <WH5971> in wrath <WH5678> with a continual stroke, <WH1115> <WH5627> <WH4347> he that ruled <WH7287> the nations <WH1471> in anger, <WH639> is persecuted, <WH4783> and none <WH1097> hindereth. <WH2820>
The whole <WH3605> earth <WH776> is at rest, <WH5117> and is quiet: <WH8252> they break forth <WH6476> into singing. <WH7440>

Yea, <WH1571> the fir trees <WH1265> rejoice <WH8055> at thee, and the cedars <WH730> of Lebanon, <WH3844> saying, Since <WH4480> <WH227> thou art laid down, <WH7901> no <WH3808> feller <WH3772> is come up <WH5927> against <WH5921> us.

Hell <WH7585> from beneath <WH4480> <WH8478> is moved <WH7264> for thee to meet <WH7122> thee at thy coming: <WH935> it stirreth up <WH5782> the dead <WH7496> for thee, even all <WH3605> the chief ones <WH6260> of the earth; <WH776> it hath raised up <WH6965> from their thrones <WH4480> <WH3678> all <WH3605> the kings <WH4428> of the nations. <WH1471>
All <WH3605> they shall speak <WH6030> and say <WH559> unto thee, Art thou <WH859> also <WH1571> become weak <WH2470> as we? art thou become like <WH4911> unto <WH413> us?

Thy pomp <WH1347> is brought down <WH3381> to the grave, <WH7585> and the noise <WH1998> of thy viols: <WH5035> the worm <WH7415> is spread <WH3331> under <WH8478> thee, and the worms <WH8438> cover <WH4374> thee.

How <WH349> art thou fallen <WH5307> from heaven, <WH4480> <WH8064> O Lucifer, <WH1966> son <WH1121> of the morning! <WH7837> how art thou cut down <WH1438> to the ground, <WH776> which didst weaken <WH2522> <WH5921> the nations! <WH1471>

For thou <WH859> hast said <WH559> in thine heart, <WH3824> I will ascend <WH5927> into heaven, <WH8064> I will exalt <WH7311> my throne <WH3678> above <WH4480> <WH4605> the stars <WH3556> of God: <WH410> I will sit <WH3427> also upon the mount <WH2022> of the congregation, <WH4150> in the sides <WH3411> of the north: <WH6828>
I will ascend <WH5927> above <WH5921> the heights <WH1116> of the clouds; <WH5645> I will be like <WH1819> the most High. <WH5945>
Yet <WH389> thou shalt be brought down <WH3381> to <WH413> hell, <WH7585> to <WH413> the sides <WH3411> of the pit. <WH953>

They that see <WH7200> thee shall narrowly look <WH7688> upon <WH413> thee, and consider <WH995> thee, saying, Is this <WH2088> the man <WH376> that made the earth <WH776> to tremble, <WH7264> that did shake <WH7493> kingdoms; <WH4467>
That made <WH7760> the world <WH8398> as a wilderness, <WH4057> and destroyed <WH2040> the cities <WH5892> thereof; that opened <WH6605> not <WH3808> the house <WH1004> of his prisoners? <WH615>
All <WH3605> the kings <WH4428> of the nations, <WH1471> even all <WH3605> of them, lie <WH7901> in glory, <WH3519> every one <WH376> in his own house. <WH1004>

But thou <WH859> art cast <WH7993> out of thy grave <WH4480> <WH6913> like an abominable <WH8581> branch, <WH5342> and as the raiment <WH3830> of those that are slain, <WH2026> thrust through <WH2944> with a sword, <WH2719> that go down <WH3381> to <WH413> the stones <WH68> of the pit; <WH953> as a carcass <WH6297> trodden under feet. <WH947>

Thou shalt not <WH3808> be joined <WH3161> with <WH854> them in burial, <WH6900> because <WH3588> thou hast destroyed <WH7843> thy land, <WH776> and slain <WH2026> thy people: <WH5971> the seed <WH2233> of evildoers <WH7489> shall never <WH3808> <WH5769> be renowned. <WH7121>

Prepare <WH3559> slaughter <WH4293> for his children <WH1121> for the iniquity <WH5771> of their fathers; <WH1> that they do not <WH1077> rise, <WH6965> nor possess <WH3423> the land, <WH776> nor fill <WH4390> the face <WH6440> of the world <WH8398> with cities. <WH5892>

For I will rise up <WH6965> against <WH5921> them, saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> and cut off <WH3772> from Babylon <WH894> the name, <WH8034> and remnant, <WH7605> and son, <WH5209> and nephew, <WH5220> saith <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068>

I will also make <WH7760> it a possession <WH4180> for the bittern, <WH7090> and pools <WH98> of water: <WH4325> and I will sweep <WH2894> it with the broom <WH4292> of destruction, <WH8045> saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts. <WH6635>

The LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> hath sworn, <WH7650> saying, <WH559> Surely <WH518> <WH3808> as <WH834> I have thought, <WH1819> so <WH3651> shall it come to pass; <WH1961> and as <WH834> I have purposed, <WH3289> so shall it <WH1931> stand: <WH6965>

That I will break <WH7665> the Assyrian <WH804> in my land, <WH776> and upon <WH5921> my mountains <WH2022> tread him under foot: <WH947> then shall his yoke <WH5923> depart <WH5493> from off <WH4480> <WH5921> them, and his burden <WH5448> depart <WH5493> from off <WH4480> <WH5921> their shoulders. <WH7926>

This <WH2063> is the purpose <WH6098> that is purposed <WH3289> upon <WH5921> the whole <WH3605> earth: <WH776> and this <WH2063> is the hand <WH3027> that is stretched out <WH5186> upon <WH5921> all <WH3605> the nations. <WH1471>

For <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> hath purposed, <WH3289> and who <WH4310> shall disannul <WH6565> it? and his hand <WH3027> is stretched out, <WH5186> and who <WH4310> shall turn it back? <WH7725>
In the year <WH8141> that king <WH4428> Ahaz <WH271> died <WH4194> was <WH1961> this <WH2088> burden. <WH4853>

Rejoice <WH8055> not <WH408> thou, whole <WH3605> Philistia, <WH6429> because <WH3588> the rod <WH7626> of him that <WH3588> smote <WH5221> thee is broken: <WH7665> for out of the serpent's root <WH4480> <WH8328> <WH5175> shall come forth <WH3318> a cockatrice, <WH6848> and his fruit <WH6529> shall be a fiery flying serpent. <WH8314> <WH5774>

And the firstborn <WH1060> of the poor <WH1800> shall feed, <WH7462> and the needy <WH34> shall lie down <WH7257> in safety: <WH983> and I will kill <WH4191> thy root <WH8328> with famine, <WH7458> and he shall slay <WH2026> thy remnant. <WH7611>

Howl, <WH3213> O gate; <WH8179> cry, <WH2199> O city; <WH5892> thou, whole <WH3605> Philistia, <WH6429> art dissolved: <WH4127> for <WH3588> there shall come <WH935> from the north <WH4480> <WH6828> a smoke, <WH6227> and none <WH369> shall be alone <WH909> in his appointed times. <WH4151>

What <WH4100> shall one then answer <WH6030> the messengers <WH4397> of the nation? <WH1471> That <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> hath founded <WH3245> Zion, <WH6726> and the poor <WH6041> of his people <WH5971> shall trust <WH2620> in it.
